title: A Lesson in Patience
description: Book #3 of the Lesson Series They say that third times a charm, but that couldn't be further from the truth for Ginny. In her latest adventure as a modern day woman trapped inside the body of a romance novel heroine, she finds herself in the late 19th century, on the frontier of America. In this body, Ginny has no memories from her heroine, forcing her to think on her feet and charm her newest hero, Colby Miller. Colby is a rancher, forced to care for his siblings after a tragic accident took the lives of his parents. Bitter and angry, Colby doesn't make it easy for Ginny to love him. Can the pair come to an understanding and fall in love? Or will Colby's bad attitude drive Ginny away before she can get her happy ending?
author: Jennifer Connors
